casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the ESTATE OF Mohamed K. BADRUDDIN, Deceased. Yasmin Koolsam Badruddin, Respondent;
v.
Yasmin Nurani Kaderali Badruddin, et al., Appellants. (And Another Related Proceeding.) 2017-1143 Court of Appeals of New York. January 16, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal dismissed upon the ground that the order sought to be appealed from does not finally determine the proceeding within the meaning of the Constitution.

Motion for poor person relief dismissed as academic.
